com.msn.gabrielle.backend

Class ReviewService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.msn.gabrielle.backend.ReviewService

  • public class ReviewService
extends java.lang.Object
    Simple backend service to store and retrieve Review instances.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static ReviewService getInstance()
        Gets the unique instance of this Singleton.
        Returns:
        the unique instance of this Singleton

      • findReviews

        public java.util.List<Review> findReviews(java.lang.String filter)
        Fetches the reviews matching the given filter text. The matching is case insensitive. When passed an empty filter text, the method returns all categories. The returned list is ordered by name.
        Parameters:
        filter - the filter text
        Returns:
        the list of matching reviews

      • deleteReview

        public boolean deleteReview(Review review)
        Deletes the given review from the review store.
        Parameters:
        review - the review to delete
        Returns:
        true if the operation was successful, otherwise false

      • saveReview

        public void saveReview(Review dto)
        Persists the given review into the review store. If the review is already persistent, the saved review will get updated with the field values of the given review object. If the review is new (i.e. its id is null), it will get a new unique id before being saved.
        Parameters:
        dto - the review to save
